name: A Goo Adventure
description:
A goo Adventure is a physics puzzle plat-former where you will play in multiple worlds, buying skills and items to help you complete your quest

Includes steam achievements + (trading cards in the future)

Fun and challenging

over 15 levels which will test your skills in platforming, thinking and reflexes.

4 passive skills:
  • WINGS
  • DOUBLE SPEED
  • POUND
  • MEGA DOUBLE JUMP

4 Items to buy in each level
  • OOZE GUN
  • BOX
  • SHORT SHIELD
  • SPAWN POINT

8 achievement packs to buy in game!
